name: Just the beginning - GameDevTV Game Jam 2022
name_original: Just the beginning - GameDevTV Game Jam 2022
description:
This game was made over the course of the 10-day game jam around the Theme "Death is only the beginning". 

I work full-time and have a family so could only afford to spend around an hour a day on this game. 

It is a super short & basic 2D platformer. 

Controls are basic WASD with space to jump. 

Left-click to attack.
